description:
The Employee model represents all Employee related information.
 Provides links to the Employee's associated Person, Legal Entity, Department, Earning, Deduction, Tax, Direct Deposit, Pay Rat and Custom Field information.

Id.description: Unique identifier of the employee in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

EmployeeNumber.description: Unique number of the employee in the tenant. Generated by Paycor.

BadgeNumber.description: Employee's assigned badge number - currently unavailable

Type.description: Enumeration of valid email type values.

EmploymentDateData.description: The Employment Date Data represents the Employee's Employment Date information.

HireDate.description:
Date the employee was hired.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

AdjustedHireDate.description:
Adjusted hire date is used when the employee's hire date does not accurately reflect benefits eligibility because an employee may have left, 
been rehired or taken a Leave of Absence. This provides an alternative date for the employee's accruals to be calculated on.
 Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

TerminationDate.description:
Date the employee was terminated.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

ReHireDate.description:
Re-hire date of the employee. Terminated employees can be rehired.
 Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

SeniorityDate.description:
Date on which the calculation of an employee's seniority is based.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

PositionData.description: The Employee Position Data model represents the Employee's Position related data.

JobTitle.description: Name of the employee's job title.

EffectiveStartDate.description:
Date the employee position data takes effect.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

EffectiveEndDate.description:
Date the employee position data is no longer in effect.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

PayGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the pay group in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

Manager.description:
The Manager model represents information about the Employee's Manager.
Provides link to the Manager's Employee level information.

Id.description: Unique identifier of the manager in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

EmployeeNumber.description: Employee number of the employee's manager.

StatusData.description: The Employee Status Data model represents Employee Employment Status information.

Status.description: Enumeration of valid Employment Status values.

Flsa.description: Enumeration of valid Types of Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) employment values.

Type.description: Enumeration of valid Employment Type values.

WorkLocation.description: The Employee Work Location Data model represents the Employee's Work Location related data.

StreetLine1.description: First line of street address information.

Type.description: Enumeration of valid Type of Work Location Address values.
